org.pepstock.charba.client.options.scales

Class BaseTick

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.ChartContainer
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.scales.BaseTick
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CartesianCategoryTick, CartesianLinearTick, CartesianLogarithmicTick, CartesianTimeTick, RadialLinearTick

    public class BaseTick
extends ChartContainer
    Base object to map an axis tick.
    It is also common to want to change the tick marks to include information about the data type.
    To do this, you need to add a callback in the axis configuration.
    If the callback returns null or undefined the associated grid line will be hidden.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
